pr_title: Improve confusing names in entities classes.

timeline.message: Improve confusing names in entities classes.

timeline.bodyText: The way this is said implies the list is exhaustive. You could use ... or eg. to take into account mods or future updates.
timeline.author: Pyrofab
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -244,7 +244,12 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1297 net/minecraft/entity/Entity
 	METHOD method_5634 getSoundCategory ()Lnet/minecraft/class_3419;
 	METHOD method_5636 setYaw (F)V
 		ARG 1 yaw
-	METHOD method_5637 isTouchingWater ()Z
+	METHOD method_5637 isWet ()Z
+		COMMENT Returns whether this entity is touching water or is being rained on or is inside a bubble column.

replies.bodyText: That's true, I also made the changes then.
replies.author: LambdAurora

timeline.author: Pyrofab
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -114,7 +114,7 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1657 net/minecraft/entity/player/PlayerEntity
 	METHOD method_7292 getLuck ()F
 	METHOD method_7293 vanishCursedItems ()V
 	METHOD method_7294 canModifyWorld ()Z
-	METHOD method_7295 updateInWater ()Z
+	METHOD method_7295 updateSubmergedInWater ()Z

replies.bodyText: I totally agree, will change then.
replies.author: LambdAurora

timeline.message: Small changes following the PR's review.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT Returns whether this entity is touching water or is being rained on or is inside a bubble column, etc...
          
          
            
            		COMMENT Returns whether this entity is touching water, or is being rained on, or is inside a bubble column...
          
      
    
    
  

Note that you would typically use either etc. or ..., but not both at once.
timeline.author: Pyrofab
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -244,7 +244,12 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1297 net/minecraft/entity/Entity
 	METHOD method_5634 getSoundCategory ()Lnet/minecraft/class_3419;
 	METHOD method_5636 setYaw (F)V
 		ARG 1 yaw
-	METHOD method_5637 isTouchingWater ()Z
+	METHOD method_5637 isWet ()Z
+		COMMENT Returns whether this entity is touching water or is being rained on or is inside a bubble column, etc...

replies.bodyText: Oh ok, sorry, wasn't aware that was different in English, my French point of view have taken over this one.
replies.author: LambdAurora

replies.bodyText: Heh, would you look at that: https://www.projet-voltaire.fr/regles-orthographe/etc-ou-etc/
replies.author: Pyrofab

replies.bodyText: oh, my bad... Didn't know that :/
replies.author: LambdAurora
